query: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS accounts(id integer PRIMARY KEY GENERATED BY DEFAULT AS IDENTITY, client text, amount numeric);TRUNCATE accounts;INSERT INTO accounts VALUES (1, 'alice', 1000.00), (2, 'bob', 100.00), (3, 'bob', 900.00);SELECT * FROM accounts;
UPDATE accounts SET amount = amount - 200 WHERE client = 'alice';SELECT * FROM accounts WHERE client = 'alice';
